metadata.name: freshness of roses
metadata.description:
freshness of roses is a part of the collection of artist rosenaz.
This collection will be 5 nfts
The physical art is oil painting in canvas size:70*70
This piece was created at 2021
You can buy the original physical painting through the website from any place in the world.Here I put the NFT price of each work much lower than its physical painting.
But for NFT buyers, I can offer  20% discount on physical purchases.
